output.conclusion: Upon completion of this course, you will have a foundational understanding of switchgear and protection principles, enabling you to contribute effectively to power system operations and maintenance.
output.courseTitle: Switchgear and Protection: A Beginner's Guide
output.introduction: Welcome to the 'Switchgear and Protection' course! This course is designed for beginners and will provide you with a comprehensive introduction to the fundamental concepts of switchgear and protection systems used in electrical power systems.

chapters.description: Overview of electrical power generation, transmission, and distribution systems. Basic components and their functions.
Defining switchgear and its importance in power system protection and control. Different types of switchgear and their applications.

modules.moduleTitle: Fundamentals of Power Systems and Switchgear

chapters.description: Introduction to circuit breakers, their operating principles, and interrupting mechanisms. Different types of circuit breakers (e.g., air, oil, vacuum, SF6).
Understanding the function of isolators and disconnectors in isolating equipment for maintenance. Safety considerations.

modules.moduleTitle: Switchgear Components: Circuit Breakers and Isolators

chapters.description: Why protection is essential for power system reliability and safety. Common types of faults and their consequences.
Overcurrent, overvoltage, and undervoltage protection. Introduction to impedance protection.
Function and application of CTs in protection schemes. Accuracy and burden ratings.
Function and application of VTs/PTs in protection schemes. Accuracy and burden ratings.
Basic relay construction and operating principles. Electromechanical, static, and numerical relays.
Types of overcurrent relays (instantaneous, definite time, inverse time). Time-current characteristics.
Basic principles of differential protection for transformers and generators. Percentage differential relays.
Introduction to distance protection schemes for transmission lines. Zone settings and reach.

modules.moduleTitle: Advanced Protection Schemes: Differential and Distance
